Name: LU 480 - Zoning, ROCKAWAY BEACH BOULEVARD REZONING, Queens (C160219ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 160219 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 480).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Attachments.Name: September 28, 2016 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - October 13, 2016

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Greenfield and Richards\b0\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 9, 2016 its decision dated August 24, 2016 (the "Decision"), on the application submitted by Rockaway Beach Hotel, LLC,\expndtw-6  \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 30b, to rezone property from R5B/C1-3 to R6A/C2-5 to facilitate development of an approximately 24,000 square foot transient hotel in the Rockaway Park neighborhood of Queens, (ULURP No. C 160219 ZMM), Community District 14,\cf1  \cf0\expndtw-4 Borough of Queens \expndtw0 (the "Application");\par
\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 160220 ZRQ (L.U. No. 481), a zoning text amendment to Appendix F (Inclusionary Housing Designated Areas and Mandatory Inclusionary Housing Areas) to apply Inclusionary Housing regulations in Community District 14, Borough of Queens; \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d(b)(1) of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on October 5, 2016;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\tab WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration (CEQR No. 15DCP145Q) issued on May 23, 2016, which includes an (E) Designation (E-387) related to air quality, noise, and hazardous materials to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tab Pursuant to Section 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 160219 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, the Council approves the Decision.\par
\pard\ltrpar\tab\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sl240\slmult1\qj The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 30b:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\tx1440 1.\tab eliminating from an existing R5B District a C1-3 District bounded by Rockaway Beach Boulevard, Beach 108\super\up7 th\nosupersub  \up0 Street, Rockaway Beach Drive, and Beach 109\super\up7 th\nosupersub  \up0 Street; \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\li720\qj\tx720\tx1440\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\tx1440 2.\tab changing from an R5B District to an R6A District property bounded by Rockaway Beach Boulevard, Beach 108\super th\nosupersub  Street, Rockaway Beach Drive, and Beach 109\super\up7 th\nosupersub  \up0 Street; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\li720\fs20\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\tx1440\fs24 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R6A District a C2-5 District bounded by Rockaway Beach Boulevard, Beach 108\super\up7 th\nosupersub  \up0 Street, Rockaway Beach Drive, and Beach 109\super\up7 th\nosupersub  \up0 Street;\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated May 23, 2016, and subject to the conditions of CEQR declaration E-387, Community District 14, Borough of Queens.\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\sl240\slmult1\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
  \tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on October 13, 2016, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
